data.title: Address by Julius Nyerere at the ceremony to mark the independence of Tanganyika (9 December 1961)
meta_keywords: address by julius nyerere at the ceremony to mark the independence of tanganyika (9 december 1961)
data.meta_description: On 9 December 1961, the new Prime Minister of Tanganyika, Julius Kambarage Nyerere, gives an address at the ceremony held to mark the proclamation of the countryâ€™s independence.
data.text:
Source: NYERERE, Julius Kambarage. Speech by the Prime Minister at the independence ceremony 9th December 1961. 09-12-1961. Kept in: The National Archives of the UK (TNA). CO - Records of the Colonial Office, Commonwealth and Foreign and Commonwealth Offices, Empire Marketing Board, and related bodies, CO 822 - Colonial Office: East Africa: Original Correspondence. Tanganyika independence celebrations, 1961. Speeches to be made, CO 822/2979.
